title: Envoy Openmetrics (cloned)
description:
## Envoy

This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Envoy cluster, allowing you to monitor its performance and resource usage, thus making it easier to identify upstream and downstream errors and bottlenecks.

For further reading on monitoring Envoy, see:

- [Datadog Envoy integration docs](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/envoy/)
- [Monitoring AWS App Mesh and Envoy with Datadog](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/envoy-app-mesh-monitoring/)

Clone this template to make changes and add your own graphs and widgets. (cloned)

definition.content: This dashboard provides a high-level overview of your Envoy cluster, allowing you to monitor its performance and resource usage, thus making it easier to identify upstream and downstream errors and bottlenecks.

**Refer to the following resources for more information**

- [Datadog Envoy documentation](https://www.envoyproxy.io/docs/envoy/latest/)

- [Available Envoy metrics](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/envoy/?tab=host#data-collected) 

- [How to monitor Envoy using AWS App Mesh](https://www.datadoghq.com/blog/envoy-app-mesh-monitoring/)
Overview of recent Envoy requests, Prometheus endpoints, and monitor statuses.

definition.title: Envoy Instance Connection State with Control Plane

definition.content: Cluster and Server stats give a quick overview of the liveliness and performance of Envoy clusters and servers.

definition.title: Incoming Requests by Cluster and Response Code

definition.content: Upstream metric provides insight such as performance, throughput and errors into the Envoy's communications with upstream services.
Downstream metrics provide insight into performance, throughput, and errors for Envoy's communication with downstream services.
Downstream Listerner Metrics provides insights on how listeners are handling incoming downstream connections from clients.
Envoy runtime metrics provide insights into the runtime configuration and behavior of the Envoy proxy.
Envoy logs are aggregated based on patterns.
Insights into Envoy Rate Limiting behavior including allowed, denied, and errored requests.

definition.title: Rate Limit Status (OK vs Over Limit)
